solution.text:
Let say \(_{{j+(3*k)+l}}_\) be the nth term of this AP
We know \(a_n=a_1\,+\,(n-1)*d\)
\(_{{j+(3*k)+l}}_ = _{j}_ + (n-1)*_{k}_\)
\(_{{j+(3*k)+l}}_ = n*_{k}_ + _{{j-k}}_\)
n = \(_{{j+(3*k)+l-k-j}}_\over _{k}_\)
n should be an integer only then \(_{{j+(3*k)+l}}_\) is a term of the given list.

content.text:
Check whether _{{j+(3*k)+l}}_ is a term of the list of numbers
\(_{j}_,_{{j+k}}_,_{{j+(2*k)}}_,_{{j+(3*k)}}_\)
